attributes.action: Increase the UK's military response against ISIS
attributes.additional_details: The death toll from ISIS terrorist attacks was 9 in 2013, increased to 1,020 in 2015 and is currently at 840 in 2016 after the horrific attack in Nice. The numbers of attacks continue to increase and ISIS continue to target some of our greatest allies such as Belgium, France and the United States. We must increase our efforts against ISIS to ensure that we are safe from terrorist attacks and to ensure the freedoms we hold so dear are protected.
attributes.background: The UK has been a part of a US-led coalition against ISIS for nearly two years. In that time period terrorist attacks around the world and against our allies have increased dramatically. We must increase our military efforts to ensure our safety and the safety of our allies by destroying ISIS.
